[Advanced Shooter](/Feats.aspx?ID=3169) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gunslinger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=406" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 113 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

You’ve dedicated your training to mastering even the most complex and weird firearms and crossbows from across the world. You gain proficiency with all advanced firearms as if they were martial firearms and with all advanced crossbows as if they were martial crossbows.
